description: This dashboard tracks statistics about Ray Serve's availability during adverse conditions.

panels.description: The Pinger deployment's success rate over its lifetime.

targets.legendFormat: Lifetime success rate (requests succeed / requests sent)

panels.title: Success Rate (Lifetime)

panels.description: The Pinger deployment's success rate over the last week.

targets.legendFormat: Weeklong success rate (requests succeed / requests sent)

panels.title: Success Rate (Last Week)

panels.description: The Pinger deployment's success rate over the last day.

targets.legendFormat: Daylong success rate (requests succeed / requests sent)

panels.title: Success Rate (Last Day)

panels.description: The Pinger deployment's success rate over the last hour.

targets.legendFormat: Hourlong success rate (requests succeed / requests sent)

panels.title: Success Rate (Last Hour)

panels.description: The number of requests sent by the Pinger deployment to the Receiver service over the deployment's lifetime.
panels.title: Requests Sent (Lifetime)

panels.description: The rate at which the Pinger sends requests. Averaged over 1 hour.
panels.title: Send Rate

panels.description: The number of requests that succeeded.
panels.title: Successful Requests (Lifetime)

panels.description: The rate at which the Pinger sends requests that succeed. Averaged over 5 minutes.
panels.title: Successful Requests Send Rate

panels.description: The number of requests that failed.
panels.title: Failed Requests (Lifetime)

panels.description: The rate at which the Pinger sends requests that failed. Averaged over 30 seconds.

targets.refId: Failed Requests Send Rate (Averaged over 30 seconds)

panels.title: Failed Requests Send Rate

panels.description: The latency of the latest request sent to the Receiver. Measured in seconds.
panels.title: Request Latency

panels.description: The average latency of requests sent to the Receiver. Averaged over 10 minute window and measured in seconds.
panels.title: Average Request Latency

panels.description: The number of retries the latest request sent to the Receiver.
panels.title: Number of Retries

panels.description: The number of retries for requests sent to the Receiver, averaged over a period of 10 minutes.
panels.title: Average Number of Retries

panels.description: Number of in-progress requests pending.
panels.title: Pending Requests

panels.description: The number of pending requests overlaid with the rate at which the Pinger sends requests that failed. Averaged over 30 seconds. Request failure rate scaled up by factor of 100 for easier viewing.

targets.refId: Failed Requests Send Rate (Averaged over 30 seconds)

panels.title: Pending Requests vs Failed Requests Rate

panels.description: The total number of failed requests by their HTTP error code.
panels.title: HTTP Error Counters

panels.description: The rate of failed requests by their HTTP error code. Averaged over 30 seconds.
panels.title: HTTP Error Rates

panels.description: The rate of requests failures compared to chaotic event, including node failures and upgrade requests. Rates are averaged over 30 seconds.

targets.legendFormat: Rate of node kill requests sent (requests/second)
targets.refId: Rate of Node Kill Requests Sent

targets.legendFormat: Rate of in-place upgrade requests sent (requests/second)

panels.title: Request Failures vs Chaotic Events

panels.description: The rate of upgrade requests failures compared to node failures. Rates are averaged over 30 seconds.

targets.legendFormat: Rate of in-place upgrade requests sent (requests/second)
Rate of node kill requests sent (requests/second)
targets.refId: Rate of Node Kill Requests Sent

panels.title: Upgrade Request Failures vs Node Failures

panels.description: The Receiver service's status over time compared against the rate of chaotic events, such as node failures and upgrade requests. Rates averaged over 30 seconds.

targets.legendFormat: Rate of in-place upgrade requests sent (requests / second)
targets.refId: Rate of In-Place Upgrade Requests Sent

targets.legendFormat: Rate of node kill requests sent (requests / second)

panels.title: Receiver Status vs Chaotic Events

panels.description: The Receiver service's status over time compared against the rate of failed requests. Rate averaged over 30 seconds.
panels.title: Receiver Status vs Failures

panels.description: The Receiver service's status over time compared against the rate of upgrade requests. Rate averaged over 30 seconds.

targets.legendFormat: Rate of in-place upgrade requests sent (requests / second)
targets.refId: Rate of In-Place Upgrade Requests Sent

targets.legendFormat: Rate of failed in-place upgrade requests

panels.title: Receiver Import Path vs Upgrades

list.description: Regex for the Pinger service's ClusterId to use when generating dashboard.
list.name: ClusterId

title: Ray Serve Chaos Test
